description:
Horace`s Chikorita was walking beside Horace at the ancient shrine in Ilex Forest in the Johto region.
Horace`s Bayleef is the evolved form of Horace`s Chikorita. It evolved sometime between Horace`s last encounter with Goh in PM2019 32 and their meeting in the Seafoam Islands in the Kanto region where it was battling a Cloyster which Goh ended up catching.
name: Chicorita (Tokio)
